original_title: Luciano Pavarotti A Life in Seven Arias
overview: This unique documentary looks back at the life of the legendary Luciano Pavarotti, with many of opera's greatest stars, including Plácido Domingo, José Carreras, Joan Sutherland, Montserrat Caballé und Juan Diego Flórez, paying personal tribute to the great man and his music. Pavarotti sings no less that seven of his most celebrated arias, defining an astonishing career that spanned four decades and took the world by storm.
title: Luciano Pavarotti A Life in Seven Arias
